metadata.title: CVE-2015-5143 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The session backends in Django before 1.4.21, 1.5.x through 1.6.x, 1.7.xbefore 1.7.9, and 1.8.x before 1.8.3 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (session store consumption) via multiple requests withunique session keys.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5143` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-django - 1.6.1-2ubuntu0.9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.1-2ubuntu0.9').
